pages.text: An imbued form of the $(l:crafting/herb_pouch)herb pouch$() that utilises the brilliant blue $(l:resources/fey_leather)fey leather$() in its construction. It has enough space to store a stack of each $(cat:herbs)herb$() plus a few non-herb items.$(br2) $(warning) Mechanics of pouches are more directly explained the $(l:spells/component_pouches)component pouches section on spells$().
